item.title: Advent of Code: 2020 Retrospect
item.description: Advent of Code is an annual programming event that spans – you guessed it – the month of December. Challenges are released at midnight for the first 25 days, and programmers race to develop working solutions to solve each problem. Also, there’s usually a fun theme to go along with the challenges, this year being built around taking a vacation (during covid, somehow?! someone needs to put the North Pole under lockdown).
